title: Easy roast chicken with gravy
description: Tom Kerridge’s quintessential Sunday roast is guaranteed to bring the family together around the table. Use up any leftover chicken in sandwiches or in a quick chicken curry, leftover chicken will keep in the fridge for 1 day.
ingredients: 2 celery stalks, trimmed, cut into chunks
small bunch fresh mixed herbs (sage, thyme and rosemary)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
potatoes and roasted vegetables, to serve
